articles.author: Simon Smale
articles.title: Mikaela Shiffrin's wait for third Olympic gold to continue after crashing out of giant slalom at Beijing Winter Olympics - ABC News
articles.description: America's defending giant slalom champion Mikaela Shiffrin, who says the experience of competing at a Games was "terrifying", falls after just five corners of her Olympic defence.
articles.content:
Mikaela Shiffrin, one of America's biggest hopes for Winter Olympic glory in alpine skiing, says she will "never get over" crashing out of the women's giant slalom on Monday.

articles.description: "Sunday Night in America" host weighed in on President Biden's pledge to nominate a Black female to replace Justice Stephen Breyer on the Supreme Court.
